name: Buguno
description:
A simple 1v1 football game. Choose your "Buguno" and play vs a friend or the cpu!

If you wanna play vs a friend Disable the [AI] button on character select.

Player 1 Controls : 

Move : A-D     Jump: Space, K, W     Attack: LMB, L, S

Player 2 Controls :

Move : Arrow Keys     Jump: Num2, B , UpKey    Attack: Num3, N, DownKey
